title: 19th Century (mostly) odds and ends lot of (11) pieces
author: balltrash

posts.post_title: 19th Century (mostly) odds and ends lot of (11) pieces
posts.post_content: Nice assortment of early baseball related tobacco cards, trade cards, and similar. All 11 pieces shown are included. All have nice appeal however please bear in mind that some have major flaws as is common for this type of material. Preference is to sell as one group but willing to entertain offers on individual pieces of there are no takers for all. Asking $650 OBO and I will pay for shipping.
